AiAssistantModule.title: Ask about Drata
AiAssistantModule.intro: Get quick, trusted answers about Drata's compliance automation platform with citations.
AiAssistantModule.placeholder: e.g., How does Drata help with SOC 2?
suggestedPrompts: How does Drata automate evidence collection?
What security certifications does Drata have?
AiAssistantModule.disclaimer: Answers may be AI-generated. Always verify with Sales for the most current information.
